Face Removal Mask

face_removal_mask.Rd

Face Removal Mask

face_removal_mask(file, template = mni_fname(mm = "1"),
  face_mask = mni_face_fname(mm = "1"), outfile = NULL,
  cost = "mutualinfo", retimg = FALSE)

deface_image(file, ...)

Arguments

file

input image
template

Template image to register input image to. Set to NULL (recommended) if want to use from https://github.com/poldracklab/pydeface. Alternatively, use mni_fname.
face_mask

Mask of image, in same space as template. Set to NULL (recommended) if want to use from https://github.com/poldracklab/pydeface. Alternatively, use mni_face_fname.
outfile

Output
cost

Cost function passed to flirt
retimg

(logical) return image of class nifti
...

not used

Value

An image or filename depending on retimg

Examples

if (have_fsl()) {
   file = "~/Downloads/sample_T1_input.nii.gz"
   if (file.exists(file)) {
       mask = face_removal_mask(file = file,
         template = NULL, face_mask = NULL)
       image = fslmask(file, mask)
   }
}
#> flirt -in "/private/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T/RtmpBk5WzQ/file47685bf6b546.nii.gz" -ref "/Users/johnmuschelli/Downloads/sample_T1_input.nii.gz" -out "/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T//RtmpBk5WzQ/file47686cef445e" -dof 12 -omat "/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T//RtmpBk5WzQ/file476821f735d5.mat" -cost mutualinfo
#> flirt -in "/private/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T/RtmpBk5WzQ/file476857a4e339.nii.gz" -ref "/Users/johnmuschelli/Downloads/sample_T1_input.nii.gz" -out "/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T//RtmpBk5WzQ/file47685071af31" -init "/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T//RtmpBk5WzQ/file476821f735d5.mat" -applyxfm -interp nearestneighbour
#> fslmaths "/Users/johnmuschelli/Downloads/sample_T1_input.nii.gz" -mas "/private/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T/RtmpBk5WzQ/file47685071af31.nii.gz"  "/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T//RtmpBk5WzQ/file4768a41e023"
